pages.text: $(br)Farmer's Crate provide access to all kinds of crop.

pages.text: Sugar Cane - 8% $(br)Cactus - 8% $(br)Moss Block - 8% $(br)Bamboo - 8% $(br)Kelp - 8% $(br)Pumpkin Seeds - 8% $(br)Melon Seeds - 8% $(br)Glow Berries - 8% $(br)Sweet Berries - 8% $(br)Cocoa Beans - 8% $(br)Brown Mushroom - 8% $(br)Red Mushroom - 8%
